title: Social Media - SMUser
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic SMUser made for the Social Media domain. This entity is primarily associated with the description of a user of Social Media applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SMUser.

userId.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The User ID of the SMUser.

platform.description: Property. Description of the  social platform of the user.

userName.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The username of the SMUser. Privacy:'Low'

createdPost.description: Relationship. The ID of the post that the SMUser created.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

isMentionedBy.description: Relationship. The ID of a post that mentions the SMUser.
